TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WorkflowOwnershipException extends System.Exception

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 工作流运行时引擎尝试加载当前正被另一个工作流运行时引擎实例加载的工作流实例时所引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the workflow runtime engine attempts to load a workflow instance that is currently loaded by another workflow runtime engine instance.

summary.span: 此外，此异常还会在这种情况下引发：工作流运行时引擎尝试在指定的所有权超时之后，加载此工作流已过期时保存工作流。

span.span: Additionally, this exception is thrown when the workflow runtime engine attempts to save a workflow after the ownership timeout that was specified while loading the workflow has expired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 供持久性服务使用，它支持多个应用程序访问相同数据库的功能。The is used by persistence services which support the capability for multiple applications to access the same database. 在上述环境中，工作流运行时的实例可能会尝试加载已被工作流运行时引擎的其他实例加载的工作流。In such an environment, an instance of the workflow runtime may try to load a workflow that is already loaded by another instance of the workflow runtime engine. 例如，当发生这种情况时， 类将引发 。For example, the class throws the when this situation occurs. 如果实现的持久性服务会引发 ，则应通过使用类的合适构造函数或在引发异常之前设置 属性来提供发生异常的工作流实例的 。If you implement a persistence service that throws the you should provide the of the workflow instance for which the exception occurs by using an appropriate constructor for the class or setting the property before you throw the exception.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将新实例的 属性初始化为系统提供的消息，该消息描述错误并考虑当前系统区域性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| ||系统提供的本地化说明。A system-supplied localized description.| ||一个空 。An empty .|

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 已发生此异常的工作流实例的 。

summary.span: 使用指定的工作流实例 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a specified workflow instance .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `instanceId` 等效于工作流实例的 属性。`instanceId` is equivalent to the property of the workflow instance. 将新实例的 属性初始化为系统提供的消息，该消息描述错误并将当前系统区域性考虑在内。The property of the new instance is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| ||系统提供的本地化说明。A system-supplied localized description.| ||已发生此异常的工作流实例的 ，由 `instanceId` 指定。The of the workflow instance, specified by `instanceId`, for which this exception occurred.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 如果使用此构造函数，则应在引发异常之前显式设置 。If you use this constructor you should explicitly set before you throw the exception. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ||一个空 。An empty .|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `instanceId` 等效于工作流实例的 属性。`instanceId` is equivalent to the property of the workflow instance. `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ||已发生此异常的工作流实例的 ，由 `instanceId` 指定。The of the workflow instance, specified by `instanceId`, for which this exception occurred.|

summary.span: 使用序列化数据初始化 WorkflowOwnershipException 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the WorkflowOwnershipException class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在序列化过程中调用此构造函数来重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during serialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关更多信息，请参见“XML 和 SOAP 序列化”。For more information see XML and SOAP Serialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

span.span: The message that describes the error.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则会在处理内部异常的 catch 块中会引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 如果 参数不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则 `innerException`属性将返回相同的值，该值将提供给构造函数或空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。The property returns the same value that is supplied to the constructor or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the `innerException` parameter does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 如果使用此构造函数，则应在引发异常之前显式设置 。If you use this constructor you should explicitly set before you throw the exception. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ||一个空 。An empty .|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 如果 参数不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则 `innerException`属性将返回相同的值，该值将提供给构造函数或空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。The property returns the same value that is supplied to the constructor or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the `innerException` parameter does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. `instanceId` 等效于工作流实例的 属性。`instanceId` is equivalent to the property of the workflow instance. `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ||已发生此异常的工作流实例的 ，由 `instanceId` 指定。The of the workflow instance, specified by `instanceId`, for which this exception occurred.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据设置 。 sets a with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在反序列化过程中，将依据通过流传输的 重建异常对象。During deserialization the exception object is reconstituted from the transmitted over the stream. 有关更多信息，请参见“XML 和 SOAP 序列化”。For more information see XML and SOAP Serialization.
